original_title: Andrés no quiere dormir la siesta
overview: After the accidental death of his mother, Andres has to move in with his grandmother, Olga, and his estranged father Raul. Andres, who doesn't like to take a nap, wanders curiously through the neighborhood, where an illegal detention center is hidden, something everyone knows, but no one dare mention. Courage and fears will be tested with lasting consequences for all.
title: Andres Doesn't Want to Take a Nap
